full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN DANG GLUD ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI DAD PA DANG GDONG BA'I DAD RNAM DPYOD KYIS MDZES PA'I GNON MO BSTAN 'DZIN TSE NANG RAB BRTAN GYI SKU RIM LA GTONG BA'I PHYI RU, ,DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS KYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN CHEN DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS,
